name: ruby_llm (crmne)
description: [项目级] One beautiful Ruby API for OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, Bedrock, Azure, OpenRouter, DeepSeek, Ollama, VertexAI, Perplexity, Mistral, xAI, GPUStack & OpenAI compatible APIs. Chat, Vision, Audio, PDF, Images, Embeddings, Tools, Streaming & Rails integration.。来源: https://github.com/crmne/ruby_llm

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
One beautiful Ruby API for OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, Bedrock, Azure, OpenRouter, DeepSeek, Ollama, VertexAI, Perplexity, Mistral, xAI, GPUStack & OpenAI compatible APIs. Chat, Vision, Audio, PDF, Images, Embeddings, Tools, Streaming & Rails integration.

来源: https://github.com/crmne/ruby_llm
语言: Ruby
Stars: 3569

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
Appraisals
CONTRIBUTING.md
Gemfile
LICENSE
README.md

bin
bin/console
bin/setup

docs/_layouts
docs/_reference

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
* **Chat:** Conversational AI with `RubyLLM.chat`
* **Vision:** Analyze images and videos
* **Audio:** Transcribe and understand speech with `RubyLLM.transcribe`
* **Documents:** Extract from PDFs, CSVs, JSON, any file type
* **Image generation:** Create images with `RubyLLM.paint`
* **Embeddings:** Generate embeddings with `RubyLLM.embed`
* **Moderation:** Content safety with `RubyLLM.moderate`
* **Tools:** Let AI call your Ruby methods
* **Agents:** Reusable assistants with `RubyLLM::Agent`
* **Structured output:** JSON schemas that just work
* **Streaming:** Real-time responses with blocks
